Stay spoiler-free while browsing Instagram with Instagram Spoiler Blocker! This lightweight and efficient extension helps you avoid unwanted spoilers by automatically hiding posts that contain specific keywords you define. Whether itâ€™s a sports event, a TV show, or any other content you'd rather not see, Instagram Spoiler Blocker has you covered.

Key Features:
Customizable Keyword Blocking: Simply enter the keywords you want to avoid, and the extension will instantly hide any posts containing those words.
Real-Time Content Filtering: As you scroll through your Instagram feed, posts containing your selected keywords are automatically blocked, even as new content loads.
Instant Feedback: Know why a post was blocked with a clear message that shows the keyword that triggered the block.
Easy to Use: Quickly add, edit, or remove keywords through the popup interface. Keywords are saved and synced across your devices.
Minimalistic Design: Clean, modern UI that seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience.
Lightweight and Efficient: Designed to work smoothly without affecting your browsing speed.

Future Updates:
Support for other platforms like YouTube.

Take control of your Instagram experience and enjoy a spoiler-free feed with Instagram Spoiler Blocker!
